body: Thanks, Abraham! I really don't know why this single geometry is causing problem because I have several other geometries which are fine with the workflow. Mayby I'll try to re-model it. As the to strange value display, I found that the flatten the inputs to the Tag 3D component can help to correct the error, see below. Please kindly verify. Nevertheless, waiting for the this component to be debugged... before: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/oxqkUGVun7RG7Hdc649rbDG7pyKlocejItJue4eYmBMFzM16aEFIegv3pl3RJFyGB-QrK0uHY5VQRMqMGA1AvLYqd-qR80p4/1.PNG) after: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/oxqkUGVun7T2dDMvP6AFJtRScmlumsmDO*nQ7wJ0-fkG89MyJnvxHmaUd8mK-Eiglvo75Xh4N4qp7lvGJNfNdaOg4cFvd6n-/2.PNG)
